meanings.definition: In a strikingly impressive or attractive manner.
meanings.sent1: She sang stunningly at the talent show, captivating the audience with her beautiful voice.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display was stunningly beautiful, lighting up the night sky with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The puppy looked stunningly adorable in its tiny bowtie, ready for the party.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky stunningly, like a masterpiece by a talented artist.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range was stunningly majestic, towering over the landscape in all its glory.

meanings.definition: To a very high degree; extremely.
meanings.sent1: She stunningly aced the exam, scoring a perfect 100%.
meanings.sent2: The athlete stunningly broke the world record, leaving the crowd in awe.
meanings.sent3: He stunningly devoured the entire pizza in under five minutes, impressing his friends.
meanings.sent4: The storm stunningly flooded the streets, causing chaos and disruption.
meanings.sent5: The singer stunningly hit the high note, showcasing her incredible vocal range.
